text: The Traveling Executioner is a 1970 American comedy drama movie directed by Jack Smight and stars Stacy Keach, Marianna Hill, Bud Cort, Graham Jarvis, James Sloyan, M. Emmet Walsh, Ford Rainey, Logan Ramsey, Val Avery and Charles Tyner. It was released by MGM on October 1, 1970. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Smight Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies
title: The Traveling Executioner
